page.description: Set the value of a 16-bit word of the blob.
page.original:
.POKEW() Syntax .POKEW( Position as N, Word_Value as N ) ArgumentDescription PositionThe position to write the data. Word_ValueA sixteen bit value.
Description The .POKEW() method sets a 16 bit word at Position in a blob to a Word_Value. The first position is 1. Example b4 = file.to_blob("C:\Wallpaper\ruth_2_081003.jpg") b4.pokew(10,12345)
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
